intro: Forrestia chinensis, commonly known as the Chinese evergreen, is a species of flowering plant native to eastern Asia. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family and is characterized by its glossy, dark green foliage. The plant produces small, white or pinkish flowers that bloom in clusters during the spring and summer months. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive appearance and relatively low maintenance requirements. Forrestia chinensis thrives in shaded to partially shaded environments and prefers moist, well-drained soil.
